name: Opal Palace
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. If you spend this mana to cast your commander, it enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Timely Ward
oracle_text:
You may cast this spell as though it had flash if it targets a commander.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has indestructible.
flavor_text: Behind every general who leads from the front is a nervous mage with a spell at the ready.

name: Condemn
oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

name: Danitha Capashen, Paragon
oracle_text:
First strike, vigilance, lifelink
Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: "I will protect the less fortunate. I will love bravely. I will face despair and fight on. As a Capashen, I can do no less."

name: Dawn Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
• Regenerate target creature.
• Counter target spell that targets you.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Faith Unbroken
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Faith Unbroken enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Faith Unbroken leaves the battlefield.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Flickerwisp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Its wings disturb more than air.

name: Ironclad Slayer
oracle_text: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The best weapon is the one at hand.

name: Martial Coup
oracle_text: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
flavor_text: Their war forgotten, the nations of Bant stood united in the face of a common threat.

name: Odric, Lunarch Marshal
oracle_text: At the beginning of each combat, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

name: On Serra's Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.
flavor_text:
"The spirit of Serra raised Brindri high and commanded her to keep the balance."
—*Song of All*, canto 524

name: Relic Seeker
oracle_text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
When Relic Seeker becomes renowned, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Oreskos Explorer
oracle_text: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Spirit Mantle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.
flavor_text: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

name: Sigarda's Aid
oracle_text:
You may cast Aura and Equipment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach it to target creature you control.
flavor_text: The Order of Saint Traft found new strength with Sigarda's support.

name: Sram, Senior Edificer
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor_text: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

name: Unquestioned Authority
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
flavor_text: After Gideon cleansed the Ninth District, none of the ganglords challenged the Boros.

name: Unbreakable Formation
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: White Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

name: Valorous Stance
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"Every choice alters the path of fate."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Winds of Rath
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures that aren't enchanted. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"There shall be a vast shout and then a vaster silence."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Alharu, Solemn Ritualist
oracle_text:
When Alharu, Solemn Ritualist enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Soul of Eternity
oracle_text:
Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
oracle_text: Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Alharu, Solemn Ritualist
oracle_text:
When Alharu, Solemn Ritualist enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Akroma's Will
oracle_text:
Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Creatures you control gain flying, vigilance, and double strike until end of turn.
• Creatures you control gain lifelink, indestructible, and protection from all colors until end of turn.

name: Angel of the Dawn
oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavor_text: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

name: Fencing Ace
oracle_text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

name: Dispeller's Capsule
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I find its symmetry pleasing. It rids our world of offensive refuse while disposing of itself."
—Dolomarus, Proctor of the Clean

name: Angelic Gift
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying.
flavor_text: "Zendikar will triumph this day, and our armies will fly with angels."

name: Open the Armory
oracle_text: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."

name: Make a Stand
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
flavor_text: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.

name: Iona's Judgment
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

name: Seraph of Dawn
oracle_text:
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: She parts the clouds so sunlight can reach even the darkest lairs and duskiest tombs.

name: Palace Sentinels
oracle_text: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
flavor_text:
"One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Orzhov Advokist
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.
flavor_text: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

name: Slaughter the Strong
oracle_text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
flavor_text:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

name: Skywhaler's Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1.
flavor_text: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

name: Soul of Eternity
oracle_text:
Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
Encore {7}{W}{W} ({7}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Slith Ascendant
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
oracle_text: Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: In a flash of a light and burst of aether, despair turned to hope and defeat turned to victory.

name: Squad Captain
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.
flavor_text: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Trusty Packbeast
oracle_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Aven Surveyor
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Aqueous Form
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Azure Fleet Admiral
oracle_text:
When Azure Fleet Admiral enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
Azure Fleet Admiral can't be blocked by creatures the monarch controls.
flavor_text:
"Your concern for my safety is touching, but as long as your gunners remain reliably erratic, I see no reason to change course."
—Admiral Yelise, to Commodore Axurik
